becomeMemberOfGroup(uint256).details: Gives permission to vote in a group.

params._group: The group ID to give permission to vote in.

getGroupsUserIsMemberIn().details: Retrieves all groups that the user has permission to vote in.

returns.groups: Returns an array of group IDs that the user has permission to vote in.

isUserMemberOfGroup(uint256).details: Checks if a user has permission to vote in a group.

returns.hasRight: Returns true if the user has permission to vote in the group, false otherwise.

removeGroupMembership(uint256).details: Removes permission to vote in a group.

params._group: The group ID to remove permission to vote in.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You are already member of specified group"

 @param _group The group ID to remove permission to vote in.
